gen:link.msg:message: `OperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePayments` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_OperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_OperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
